parameters.content:
# WhatsApp AI Assistant 

**No Business Verification Required
Instant activation with full WhatsApp Group support.**

**Instantly answer WhatsApp questions using your internal documents. No AI training required.**

*Skip the complex WhatsApp Business Cloud API setup - WhapAround solve that problem for you.*

## How It Works
Your assistant reads a live Google Doc, processes incoming WhatsApp messages, generates AI responses using OpenAI/Gemini, and sends replies automatically.

## Requirements
- **WhapAround Account**: https://whaparound.pro/ (eliminates need for WhatsApp Business Cloud API configuration)
- **Google Doc** with your business content
- **API Key**: OpenAI or Gemini
- **Database** (optional): PostgreSQL memory setup - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JjBofKJnYIU

## Quick Setup
1. Add your Google Doc ID to the Docs node
2. Connect WhatsApp webhook (follow provided guidance)
3. Map the message field
4. Connect your AI provider (OpenAI/Gemini)
5. Test with a live message

## Professional Setup Services
Need help with implementation? We provide:
- **Easy WhatsApp connection** (bypass WhatsApp Business Cloud API complexity entirely)
- Google OAuth & document structure
- AI model configuration
- Custom branding & tone
- Logging & escalation systems

**Contact**: andrea@jamot.pro | WhatsApp: +16508665016
